sentences.en: A shortage of building land will push property values up.
sentences.cn: 建筑用地缺乏将造成房地产价格逐渐上升.

sentences.en: Any shortage could push up grain prices.
sentences.cn: 任何一种短缺都会抬高粮食价格。

sentences.en: Manufacturing industry was worst affected by the fuel shortage.
sentences.cn: 燃料短缺制造业最受到影响.

sentences.en: Patients were dying because of an acute shortage of nurses.
sentences.cn: 因为护理人员严重不足，患者生命垂危。

sentences.en: Shortage of funds is still very much a live issue.
sentences.cn: 资金短缺仍然是当前的重大问题.

sentences.en: The city is suffering a desperate shortage of water.
The heart of the problem is a shortage of funds.
sentences.cn: 问题的关键是缺乏经费.

sentences.en: the perennial problem of water shortage
The problem is accentuated by a shortage of water and electricity.
sentences.cn: 缺乏水电使问题愈加严重.

sentences.en: The shortage of bread will probably drive prices up.
sentences.cn: 面包短缺很有可能迫使价格上涨.

sentences.en: There is a shortage of council housing.
There is a shortage of principal.
There is an acute shortage of water.
There is no heating available due to fuel shortages.
sentences.cn: 因为燃料短缺，所以没有供暖。

sentences.en: There is no shortage of funds.
Wartime austerities included food rationing and shortage of fuel.
sentences.cn: 战时的艰苦包括食物配给和燃料短缺.

words.tran_cn: 短的；不足的；急速的；唐突的

phrases.tran_cn: 资金不足， 资金短缺
房荒；住房紧张；住宅不足
淡水短缺；淡水资源短缺

trans.tran_en: a situation in which there is not enough of something that people need
